lead_paragraph: Mr. Hollande stunned the nation with his decision, even though few observers thought he could recover from his poor approval ratings to win next year’s vote.

byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Paris.

headline.print_headline: Hollande, in Surprise Move, Won’t Seek Re-election
headline.main: President François Hollande of France Won’t Seek Re-election

snippet: Mr. Hollande stunned the nation with his decision, even though few observers thought he could recover from his poor approval ratings to win next year’s vote....
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande's unprecedented decision to eschew re-election next year plummets upcoming presidential race into uncertainty, as nation reacts to stunning turn of events.
